sections.text:
1-117.Certified public accountant; completion of examination; additional requirements.

Any person who has successfully completed the examination described in section 1-114 shall have no status as a certified public accountant unless and until he or she has the requisite experience and also has been issued a certificate as a certified public accountant.

SourceLaws 1957, c. 1, § 12, p. 59;Laws 1976, LB 619, § 3;Laws 1984, LB 473, § 7;Laws 1991, LB 75, § 6;Laws 1997, LB 114, § 14.
